properties.description: Blending neighborhood charm with modern design, Radisson Blu Hotel, London Bloomsbury is your stylish retreat in central London. A short walk from Tottenham Court Road and Covent Garden, we offer contemporary spaces to work, meet, or unwind, moments from the British Museum. Elegant rooms and suites provide a peaceful escape, featuring premium bedding and Urban Apothecary toiletries, with spaces designed for both relaxation and work. Guests can enjoy our chic lounge areas for informal meetings or quiet focus time.
properties.location: 9-13 Bloomsbury Street, Nr Covent Garden, Camden, London, WC1B 3QD

properties.description: The self-contained pet friendly apartments at Residence Inn by Marriott London Kensington offers complimentary WiFi in the public areas and a chic separate lounge area with a flat-screen TV and on-demand movies. Boasting contemporary styling, the apartments are just a 3-minute walk from Kensington High Street.
properties.location: 181 - 183 Warwick Road, Kensington and Chelsea, London, W14 8PU

properties.description: Staybridge Suites aims to ensure a guestâ€™s comfort as soon as they enter the bright, contemporary lobby, which is adjacent to a comfy lounge with fireplace. Each modern suite or studio features a small kitchen, private bathroom and a TV.

Featuring large windows and hardwood floors, the Native Kings Wardrobe, St Pauls have separate bedrooms and luxury bathrooms. The spacious living areas have sofas and a TV. The fitted kitchens at Kings Wardrobe have an oven, microwave and refrigerator, and kitchenware is provided. There is also a dining area, and laundry facilities are available.
properties.location: 53-55 Carter Lane, City of London, London, EC4V 5AF

properties.description: Classic English House in London offers a three-bedroom villa with a living room. Family rooms provide ample space for relaxation. Guests enjoy free WiFi, a terrace, and a garden. The property includes a fully equipped kitchen, washing machine, and a fireplace.

he Ridge London in London offers a spacious, recently renovated villa with five bedrooms and five bathrooms. Guests enjoy a sun terrace, garden, and open-air bath. The property features a spa and wellness center with a sauna and hot tub. Additional amenities include a lounge, outdoor fireplace, and beauty services.

Heritage Look, Luxury Feel - London Family House in London offers a villa with five bedrooms and six bathrooms. The property features a spacious living room and family rooms, ensuring comfort for all guests. Guests enjoy free WiFi, air-conditioning, and a fully equipped kitchen. Additional facilities include a garden, outdoor play area, and an electric vehicle charging station. Free on-site private parking is available.
